value.title: ML.NET - Machine Learning Introduction | ML.NET [1 of 8]
value.excerpt: Welcome to Machine Learning with ML.NET! In this video we will introduce the concept of Machine Learning and what you can do with Machine Learning.   Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download Visual Studio 2019 here: https://aka.ms/VisualStudio-dotnetconf19
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X0DQjfW09kA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: ML.NET Introduction | ML.NET [2 of 8]
value.excerpt: Learn all about what ML.NET is and what you can do with the Framework. You will also see how customers using it, the open source momentum, and a short demo of the experience.  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download Visual
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/83kEkJEXQnY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Getting started with ML.NET | ML.NET [3 of 8]
value.excerpt: Learn how you can get started with ML.NET on Windows, Mac, and Linux using tools (ML.NET Model Builder, ML.NET CLI) or code-first using ML.NET API.   Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download Visual Studio 2019 here: https://aka.ms/VisualStudio-dotnetconf19
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7U14iupLMdk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build a ML model for Sentiment Analysis | ML.NET [4 of 8]
value.excerpt: In this video, we will cover how to build a ML model for sentiment analysis of customer reviews using a binary classification algorithm.  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download Visual Studio 2019 here: https://aka.ms/VisualStudio-dotnetconf19
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p3kHlpLvWNI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build a ML model for GitHub Issue classification | ML.NET [5 of 8]
value.excerpt: In the world of ML.NET there is a high-volume of interaction with GitHub. This video will teach you how to classify incoming GitHub issues into one of the many tags (labels) using a multi-class classification algorithm.  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/spPq7PdnmRs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build a ML model for predicting taxi fares | ML.NET [6 of 8]
value.excerpt: There are tons of different ways to use the model builder with ML.NET. In this video, we learn how to predict taxi fares based on distance traveled, trip time etc. using a regression algorithm.   Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CnmmhxGUgqg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build a ML model for Movie Recommendation | ML.NET [7 of 8]
value.excerpt: Following our last video, here are even more ways to use the model builder with ML.NET. In this video, we learn how to recommend movies for users using colloborative filtering based recommendation approach.  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f2KIjQCVN0A" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Deep learning with ML.NET: Image Classification | ML.NET [8 of 8]
value.excerpt: Deep learning enables many more scenarios using sound, images, text and other data types. Learn how to build an Image Classification model to classify flowers (daisies, roses etc.).  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C9p38jXKhB0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
